projects.title: Watchlist
projects.description: Watchlist is a movie and tv series database for getting the latest information about trending or specific movies. You can add a movie or tv series to your favourite and reference it later.

projects.title: Class Konnect
projects.description: An Android video call app made using Jitsi Meet SDK to improve E-Learning in educational institutions. It can connects up to 75 participants/students learning synchronously from a live video conferencing lecture. It is a free alternative to schools with a maximum capacity of 75 participants per class.

projects.title: Devfesttttt
projects.description: A wear Os verion of the devfest 2022 mobile app. It is a multi-module application that connects and transfers data between the paired Android and Wear os devices. It Displays the agenda, program sessions, and speakers details for the Devfest event.

projects.title: Bill Reminder
projects.description: A Reminder app that saves paid and unpaid bill along with their details in a local room database. It uses Alarm Manager and Notification Manager to send reminder notifications for unpaid bills in due time. It complise with Material design guidelines.

projects.title: 2FA
projects.description: An authentication android app that generates Time-Based One-Time-Passwords for online authentication. It was developed using Kotlin, Room database, Jetpack Datastore, and Base32 for encoding and decoding. It leverages github actions for CI/CD and generate an apk artifacts on push.
